SEARCH
Package ca.concordia.soen6441.project.map

Class CountryImpl

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.soen6441.project.map.CountryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Country, MapComponent
public class CountryImpl extends Object implements Country, MapComponent
Implementation of the Country interface. Represents a country in the game with its properties and behaviors.

      p_numericID - Numeric ID of the country
      p_ID - String ID of the country.
      p_Continent - Continent to which the country belongs.
      p_xCoord - X coordinate of the country.
      p_yCoord - Y coordinate of the country.
